title: Four Corners - Chief Justice

description: Presented by Liz Jackson, this episode from the "Four Corners" series looks at the role of the Australian High Court in lawmaking. In a wide-ranging interview with former High Court Chief Justice Sir Anthony Mason, the main question answered is whether the protection of individual rights is better left in the hands of Judges or politicians.
related_objects: Object; R0000858; [Four corners : publicity kit]; ABC-TV (Australia); To be Catalogued
